title: Login problem to EU Nordic & East server
body:
When I open LOL to the EU Nordic & East server and try to login, i get an error login message.
'Can't login to Pvp.net'

But when I change regions, to North America for example, i login normally but I go back to Level 1. 

Even more, when I use my phone connection to login, it works, but can't use my phone connection always.

This happened straight after I tried installing a game called "Rift" which I directly deleted after this error..


Please could anyone advise on how to fix this?

replies.body: same problem here,i can not log in Eune for 3 days now.i can log in on west or america but not Eune,please help

Since you're seeing this issue, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate this on an individual basis. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I just submitted the ticket..

Thank you for the help so far..

It's actually a widespread issue. Y'all published a support article on Monday and deleted it, then y'all performed a network maintenance yesterday on EUNE which still didn't solve it.

Players are able to play using a VPN but usually receive lag so once they get in the game they need to switch back to their network and they have to do it every time they start a game.

Hey Rineyy,

I appreciate you following up on this. You're correct, it's an issue that's affecting a specific subset of players. We're working on a permanent fix, in the meantime the current solution we have is to resolve it on an individual basis.

I see, will advise fellow Summoners accordingly then.

Any ETA on the fix though?
